description.english: Wake up after having cleared the labyrinth for the first time in the dream.
description.french: Réveillez-vous après avoir parcouru le labyrinthe pour la première fois en rêve.
description.german: Wach auf, nachdem du das Labyrinth erstmals im Traum durchquert hast.
description.italian: Svegliati dopo aver superato il labirinto per la prima volta nel sogno.
description.japanese: 夢の中での初めての迷宮クリア後に目覚める
description.spanish: Despierta tras haber superado el laberinto por primera vez en el sueño.

description.english: Re-visit the labyrinth in Fort Dragonia—this time, for real.
description.french: Visitez à nouveau le labyrinthe du fort Dragonia... pour de bon cette fois !
description.german: Betritt erneut das Labyrinth in Fort Dragonia – dieses Mal wirklich.
description.italian: Torna nel labirinto di Forte Dragonia, stavolta nella realtà.
description.japanese: 夢の中でみた迷宮古龍の砦に再び入る
description.spanish: Regresa al laberinto del Bastión Dragonia... Esta vez, de verdad.

description.english: Defeat Lynx at Fort Dragonia.
description.french: Venez à bout de Lynx au fort Dragonia.
description.german: Besiege Lynx in Fort Dragonia.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Lynx a Forte Dragonia.
description.japanese: 古龍の砦で宿敵ヤマネコを倒す
description.spanish: Derrota a Lynx en el Bastión Dragonia.

description.english: Defeat Dark Serge at Fort Dragonia.
description.french: Venez à bout de Serge des ténèbres au fort Dragonia.
description.german: Besiege den dunklen Serge in Fort Dragonia.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Serge oscuro a Forte Dragonia.
description.japanese: 古龍の砦で世界の敵ダークセルジュを倒す
description.spanish: Derrota a Serge oscuro en el Bastión Dragonia.

description.english: Use the Dragon God relics at the Dead Sea Ruins to enter the Sea of Eden.
description.french: Servez-vous des reliques des Dragons aux ruines de la mer Morte pour pénétrer dans la mer d'Éden.
description.german: Benutze die Drachengott-Relikte in den Ruinen am Meer am Ende, um das Meer von Eden zu erreichen.
description.italian: Usa le reliquie del Drago Divino nelle Rovine del Mare Mortum per accedere al Mare di Eden.
description.japanese: 死海跡で龍神の祈りを使い神の庭へ入る
description.spanish: Accede al Mar del Edén usando las reliquias del dios dragón en las ruinas del Mar Muerto.

displayName.japanese: 時間要塞・クロノポリス

description.english: Arrive in Chronopolis, the Time Fortress.
description.french: Arrivez à Chronopolis, la forteresse du Temps.
description.german: Erreiche die Zeitfestung Chronopolis.
description.italian: Arriva a Cronopolis, la Fortezza del Tempo.
description.japanese: 時間要塞クロノポリスへ到着する
description.spanish: Ábrete camino hasta Cronópolis, la Fortaleza del Tiempo.

description.english: Defeat FATE, the mother computer of Chronopolis.
description.french: Venez à bout de SORT, l'ordinateur central de Chronopolis.
description.german: Besiege FATUM, den Muttercomputer von Chronopolis.
description.italian: Sconfiggi FATO, il computer principale di Cronopolis.
description.japanese: クロノポリスで中枢マザーコンピュータフェイトを倒す
description.spanish: Acaba con HADO, el ordenador nodriza de Cronópolis.

description.english: Obtain Chrono Cross, the rainbow-aligned Element.
description.french: Obtenez la croix du Temps, l'élément arc-en-ciel.
description.german: Erhalte das Kreuz der Zeit, das Regenbogenelement.
description.italian: Ottieni la Croce del Tempo, l'Elemento iridato.
description.japanese: 虹属性エレメント「クロノクロス」を手に入れる
description.spanish: Consigue el Chrono Cross, el elemento del arcoíris.

displayName.japanese: 時を喰らうもの（進化形態）撃破

description.english: Defeat the evolved form of the Time Devourer.
description.french: Venez à bout de la forme évoluée du Dévoreur du Temps.
description.german: Besiege die weiterentwickelte Form des Zeitverschlingers.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la forma evoluta del Cronofago.
description.japanese: 時を喰らうもの（進化形態）を倒す
description.spanish: Derrota a la versión evolucionada del Cronófago.

description.english: See the good ending.
description.french: Assistez à la fin heureuse.
description.german: Sieh dir das gute Ende an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale positivo.
description.japanese: グッドエンディングを見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final bueno.

description.english: See the bad ending.
description.french: Assistez à la fin tragique.
description.german: Sieh dir das böse Ende an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale negativo.
description.japanese: バッドエンディングを見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final malo.

description.english: See Ending 1: The Developers' Room.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 1 : Le coin des développeurs.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 1: „Der Raum der Entwickler“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 1: La stanza degli sviluppatori.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.1「開発室」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 1: La sala de los desarrolladores.

description.english: See Ending 2: The Acacian Empire.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 2 : L'empire d'Acacia.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 2: „Das Akazia-Imperium“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 2: L'Impero di Acacia.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.2「アカシア大帝国誕生」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 2: El imperio acaciano.

description.english: See Ending 3: The Magical Dreamers.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 3 : Les Magical Dreamers.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 3: „Die Magischen Träumer“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 3: Magical Dreamers.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.3「スラッシュステージ」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 3: Vuelven los Magical Dreamers.

displayName.english: The Shop Staff and the Three Unlikely Heroes
displayName.french: Le vendeur et les trois improbables héros
displayName.german: Die Verkäufer und die 3 unerwarteten Helden
displayName.italian: I commessi e tre improbabili eroi
displayName.japanese: ショップでバイト＆まぬけな3人組
displayName.spanish: Un tendero y tres héroes improbables

description.english: See Ending 4: The Shop Staff and the Three Unlikely Heroes.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 4 : Le vendeur et les trois improbables héros.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 4: „Die Verkäufer und die 3 unerwarteten Helden“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 4: I commessi e tre improbabili eroi.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.4「ショップでバイト＆まぬけな3人組」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 4: El tendero y los héroes improbables.

description.english: See Ending 5: The Rebirth of Marbule.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 5 : La renaissance de Marbule.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 5: „Die Wiedergeburt Marbules“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 5: La rinascita di Marbule.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.5「新生マブーレ」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 5: El resurgir de Gneis.

description.english: See Ending 6: The Last Stand.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 6 : Le baroud d'honneur.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 6: „Die Entscheidungsschlacht“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 6: Lo scontro decisivo.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.6「ヤマネコ討伐」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 6: La batalla final.

description.english: See Ending 7: The Viper Orphanage.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 7 : L'orphelinat Ophide.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 7: „Das Viper-Waisenhaus“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 7: L'orfanotrofio di Viper.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.7「蛇骨幼稚園」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 7: El orfanato Ofidio.

description.english: See Ending 8: The Dark Fate.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 8 : Le sort funeste.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 8: „Das dunkle Schicksal“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 8: Un destino oscuro.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.8「黒い運命の書」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 8: El Hado oscuro.

description.english: See Ending 9: The Dragon God's Revenge.
description.french: Assistez à la fin 9 : La vengeance du Dragon divin.
description.german: Sieh dir Ende 9: „Die Rache des Drachengottes“ an.
description.italian: Guarda il finale 9: La vendetta del Drago Divino.
description.japanese: エンディングNo.9「龍神たちの復讐」を見る
description.spanish: Consigue el final 9: La venganza del dios dragón.

displayName.japanese: コンディションを整えよう

description.english: Flee from a battle.
description.french: Fuyez un combat.
description.german: Fliehe aus einem Kampf.
description.italian: Fuggi da un incontro.
description.japanese: 戦闘から逃げる
description.spanish: Huye de un combate.

description.english: Use Serge's unique level 7 tech, Flying Arrow.
description.french: Utilisez la technique unique de niveau 7 de Serge : Étincelance.
description.german: Benutze Serges Spezialtechnik auf Stufe 7: Himmelspfeil.
description.italian: Usa la tecnica unica di livello 7 di Serge, Volo della freccia.
description.japanese: セルジュの固有技エレメントLv7「スカイアロー」を使用する
description.spanish: Utiliza la técnica especial de nivel 7 de Serge, Flecha celestial.

description.english: Use Kid's unique level 7 tech, Hot Shot.
description.french: Utilisez la technique unique de niveau 7 de Kid : Machine à tuer.
description.german: Benutze Kids Spezialtechnik auf Stufe 7: Strahlenkanone.
description.italian: Usa la tecnica unica di livello 7 di Kid, Cannonata rovente.
description.japanese: キッドの固有技エレメントLv7「ヒートショット」を使用する
description.spanish: Utiliza la técnica especial de nivel 7 de Kid, Termocañón.

description.english: Use Lynx's unique level 7 tech, Forever Zero.
description.french: Utilisez la technique unique de niveau 7 de Lynx : Néant éternel.
description.german: Benutze Lynx’ Spezialtechnik auf Stufe 7: Annullierung.
description.italian: Usa la tecnica unica di livello 7 di Lynx, Nulla eterno.
description.japanese: ヤマネコの固有技エレメントLv7「ゼロエターナル」を使用する
description.spanish: Utiliza la técnica especial de nivel 7 de Lynx, Vacío absoluto.

description.english: Use Harle's unique level 7 tech, Lunairetic.
description.french: Utilisez la technique unique de niveau 7 d'Arle : Éclipse de lune.
description.german: Benutze Harles Spezialtechnik auf Stufe 7: Mondsucht.
description.italian: Usa la tecnica unica di livello 7 di Harle, Frattura lunare.
description.japanese: ツクヨミの固有技エレメントLv7「月壊」を使用する
description.spanish: Utiliza la técnica especial de nivel 7 de Arle, Eclipse lunar.

description.english: Use the triple tech Delta Force.
description.french: Utilisez la technique trio Zone delta.
description.german: Benutze die Dreiertechnik Delta-Attacke.
description.italian: Usa la tecnica tripla Zona delta.
description.japanese: 3人連携技エレメント「ミックスデルタ」を使用する
description.spanish: Utiliza la técnica triple Ataque delta.

displayName.french: D'un Z qui veut dire Zêta
displayName.spanish: De la A a la Z

description.english: Use the triple tech Z-Slash.
description.french: Utilisez la technique trio Frappe zêta.
description.german: Benutze die Dreiertechnik Z-Schlag.
description.italian: Usa la tecnica tripla Fendente Z.
description.japanese: 3人連携技エレメント「ゼット斬り」を使用する
description.spanish: Utiliza la técnica triple Tajo Z.

description.english: Triumph in 500 battles.
description.french: Remportez 500 combats.
description.german: Siege in 500 Kämpfen.
description.italian: Vinci 500 incontri.
description.japanese: 500回戦闘に勝利する
description.spanish: Consigue la victoria en 500 combates.

description.english: Use the Chrono Cross item to recruit all party members.
description.french: Utilisez la croix du Temps et recrutez tous les personnages.
description.german: Benutze das Kreuz der Zeit und wirb sämtliche Gruppenmitglieder an.
description.italian: Usa la Croce del Tempo e recluta tutti i membri del gruppo.
description.japanese: アイテム「クロノクロス」を使用し全ての仲間を揃える
description.spanish: Utiliza el Chrono Cross y recluta a todos los miembros posibles del grupo.

description.english: Create a rainbow weapon.
description.french: Fabriquez une arme arc-en-ciel.
description.german: Stelle eine Waffe aus Regenbogen her.
description.italian: Crea un'arma iridata.
description.japanese: 虹の武器をどれかひとつ作る
description.spanish: Fabrica un arma arcoíris.

description.english: Create a piece of rainbow armor.
description.french: Fabriquez un élément d'armure arc-en-ciel.
description.german: Stelle einen Rüstungsgegenstand aus Regenbogen her.
description.italian: Crea un'armatura o protezione iridata.
description.japanese: 虹の防具をどれかひとつ作る
description.spanish: Fabrica una armadura o artículo de protección arcoíris.

displayName.japanese: グランドリームへ進化

description.english: Defeat Dario and reforge Serge's Sea Swallow into the Mastermune.
description.french: Venez à bout de Dario et fondez l'aileron des mers de Serge pour obtenir Mastarmune.
description.german: Besiege Dario und verwandle Serges Meeresglefe in den Großen Löwen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Dario e trasforma l'Ala del mare di Serge nella Mastermune.
description.japanese: ダリオを倒しシースワローを「グランドリーム」へ進化させる
description.spanish: Derrota a Darío y transforma la hélice oceánica de Serge en la Mastermune.

description.english: Collect all 15 types of window frame.
description.french: Collectionnez les 15 types de liseré.
description.german: Sammle alle 15 verschiedenen Fensterrahmen.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i 15 tipi di cornici per il testo.
description.japanese: 15種類あるフレームをすべて手に入れる
description.spanish: Hazte con los 15 marcos.

description.english: Successfully feed the dragons 100 times in the dragon-feeding mini-game.
description.french: Nourrissez 100 fois les dragons dans le mini-jeu.
description.german: Füttere die Drachen 100 Mal im Minispiel Drachenfütterung.
description.italian: Dai da mangiare ai draghi 100 volte nel minigioco del mangime per draghi.
description.japanese: ミニゲーム「龍の餌やり」の「100回」をクリアする
description.spanish: Consigue alimentar a los dragones 100 veces en el minijuego.

description.english: Complete the Grand Slam.
description.french: Terminez la Grande rixe.
description.german: Schließe die Monsterdresche ab.
description.italian: Completa il Grande Slam.
description.japanese: ミニゲーム「グランドスラム」を達成する
description.spanish: Supera la Gran Trifulca.

description.english: Get 10,000 points in the compass roulette mini-game.
description.french: Gagnez 10 000 points à la roulette cardinale.
description.german: Erhalte 10.000 Punkte im Minispiel Kompass-Roulette.
description.italian: Totalizza 10.000 punti nel minigioco della bussola roulette.
description.japanese: ミニゲーム「コンパスルーレット」にて10,000ポイント手に入れる
description.spanish: Consigue 10 000 puntos en el minijuego de la Brújula de la Fortuna.

description.english: Obtain 99 level-growth stars.
description.french: Obtenez 99 étoiles d'évolution de niveau.
description.german: Erhalte 99 Stufenaufstiegssterne.
description.italian: Ottieni 99 stelle di crescita del livello.
description.japanese: レベルスターを99個手に入れる
description.spanish: Consigue 99 estrellas de nivel.
